Name: Horde Hunters
About the game: The horde is here. Pick a hunter and defeat the demon invasion! Horde Hunters takes the popular horde survival genre (aka bullet heaven) that Vampire Survivors started to new directions. It was built with some key ideas in mind from the very beginning; Features Twin-stick movement Main weapon shoots where you aim while other weapons auto-fire Unique weapon and ability for each character Consumables (instant single-use items) can be picked up and used when needed Gold is used during the run to buy/sell/upgrade your gear Short runs on normal maps (~15min to endgame) with a chance to continue playing beyond Special endless maps (until you die) with leaderboard score rankings Procedurally generated maps that have unique buildings you can interact with Gameplay is active and gives you more control over how your run ends
Meta Title: Horde Hunters: Feb 16, 2023, Antti Vaihia and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Horde Hunters? Check out the release date (Feb 16, 2023), developer insights from Antti Vaihia, and a complete game summary.
